entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -15.3°C

Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
